title: See where U.S., Israeli strikes have hit Iran and where Iran has retaliated
summary_full: Satellite images and videos reveal dozens of targets of strikes on Iran, including the Tehran compound of Iran’s supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei. Iran has hit at least one U.S. base in the region.
summary_public: Satellite images and videos reveal dozens of targets of strikes on Iran, including the Tehran compound of Iran’s supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei. Iran has hit at least one U.S. base in the region.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: U.S., Israeli strikes have hit Iran
